entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 p.m. NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying inland areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 12 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
